articles.description: Artur Beterbiev beat Dmitry Bivol by majority decision to become undisputed light-heavyweight world champion in a high-quality contest in Saudi.
articles.title: Artur Beterbiev outpoints Dmitry Bivol, Fabio Wardley knocks out Frazer Clarke

articles.description: Steve Clarke was denied a tangible and much-needed piece of optimism as Croatia inflicted Scotland's latest honourable defeat, writes Tom English.
articles.title: 'More late Scotland anguish as Clarke fights cynicism & scepticism'

articles.description: After winning an unprecedented quadruple in the Super League era, are Wigan Warriors the greatest ever side?
articles.title: Grand Final: Are 2024 quadruple winners Wigan Warriors the greatest team ever?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Belarus versus Northern Ireland in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Belarus vs Northern Ireland: Uefa Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: South Africa clinch a seven-wicket win over Bangladesh but now face a nervous wait to see if they will qualify for the Women's T20 World Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: South Africa beat Bangladesh but face nervous semi-final wait

articles.description: Manchester United are prepared to offload Harry Maguire in January, Erling Haaland will not join Paris St-Germain from Manchester City, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Maguire, Haaland, Costa, Fernandez Carreras, Gittens

articles.description: Scotland fall agonisingly short in their attempt to defend their WXV2 title, as Australia edge a gripping contest in Cape Town to win the competition
articles.title: WXV2: Australia beat Scotland in thriller to secure title

articles.description: Follow live text and 5 Live commentary as England travel to face Finland in the Nations League.
articles.title: England vs Finland: Lee Carsley wants reaction from Three Lions after Nations League Greece defeat

articles.description: Ben Whittaker's fight with Liam Cameron ends in bizarre circumstances after both fighters fall over the ropes and out of the ring.
articles.title: Boxing: Ben Whittaker fight ends in draw after boxer falls over the ropes

articles.description: The success of Luis de la Fuente with Spain and Lionel Scaloni with Argentina may boost Lee Carsley's hopes of landing the England job.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: What can England learn from Luis de la Fuente and Lionel Scaloni?
